pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Analysis of Dynamic Generalized Linear Models // Provide routines for filtering and smoothing, forecasting, sampling and Bayesian analysis of Dynamic Generalized Linear Models using the methodology described in Alves et al. (2024)doi:10.48550/arXiv.2201.05387 and dos Santos Jr. et al. (2024)doi:10.48550/arXiv.2403.13069.
